data.title: Lydia Shum Net Worth, Death, Wiki, Biography, Age, Parents, Husband, Daughter
data.meta_description: Lydia Shum Net Worth, Death, Wiki, Biography, Age, Parents, Husband, Daughter and Lydia Shum was one of the most popular celebrities in Hong Kong, China who was a well-known comedian, master of ceremonies (MC), actress, and singer.
data.text:
In this blog, we will discuss all details about Lydia Shum, her date of birth, profession, religion, zodiac sign, nationality, ethnicity, parents and siblings, husband and children’s details, her height and weight, and educational qualifications, and career details, and much more.

Lydia Shum was one of the most popular celebrities in Hong Kong, China who was a well-known comedian, master of ceremonies (MC), actress, and singer. She was best known for her physical appearance, including her portly figure, her glasses, and hairstyle.

Lydia Shum is in news as the search engine Google paid tribute to her on her 77th birth anniversary by launching her doodle.

Lydia Shum Net Worth, Death, Wiki, Biography, Age, Parents, Husband, Daughter & More

Lydia Shum was born on 21st July 1945 in Shanghai, China. She passed away aged 62 on 19th February 2008 in Queen Mary Hospital in Hong Kong due to pleural effusion, a medical condition.

Lydia Shum was born to Sung Shen Gee and his wife Sung Tan Sun. She had a brother named Alfred Sung who is a Canadian fashion designer and a businessman.

Lydia Shum made her film debut in 1960 with the film “When the Peach Blossoms Bloom”. Later, she became popular with the reality show “Enjoy Yourself Tonight” and sang with the Cantopop group. Some of her other films are “Drunken Tai Chi”, “Millionaire’s Express”, “It’s a Mad Mad World”, and “In-Laws Outlaws” among others.

Lydia Shum got married to actor and singer Adam Cheng in 1985 after living together for over eleven years and had a daughter named Joyce Cheng born in May 1987. Soon, the couple got divorced in the year 1988. Their daughter, Joyce is also a Hong Kong-Canadian singer, actress, and writer.
